'''''Where Once There Were Arms Aplenty''''' is part of the {{Quest|Chronicler of the Crumbling City}}.

==Steps==
# Clear the [[Abyss]]al corrosion in this area
#* Defeat enemies:
#** Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*6; Electro Samachurl}}
#** Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*2; Hilichurl Berserker*2; Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl}}
#** Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Rockfond Rifthound Whelp*2}}
#** Wave 4: {{Enemy List|Rockfond Rifthound Whelp; Tenebrous Mimesis: Tatankasaurus}}<!-- after this wave, Abyssal Corrosion Level no longer decreases upon defeating enemies -->
#** Wave 5 (optional): {{Enemy List|Rockfond Rifthound Whelp*2; Rockfond Rifthound}}
#** Wave 6 (optional):{{verify|verify enemies}} {{Enemy List|Rockfond Rifthound Whelp; Rockfond Rifthound}}
#* Destroy the [[Oozing Core]]s

==Gameplay Notes==
* By the beginning of Wave 3, all three Oozing Cores will have spawned in. Destroying the cores is sufficient to progress the quest; it is not necessary to clear Waves 4-6.{{verify}}
* Completing this quest rewards 1 Precious Chest, 1 Exquisite Chest, and 1 Common Chest.
